jasperReport.name: activity_log
jasperReport.queryString: SELECT t.ticketid, sc.contract_number AS contractnumber, sc.current_start_date AS startdate, sc.current_end_date AS enddate, sc.description AS description, cat.description AS category, sc_type.description AS "type", ct.namelast AS lastname, ct.namefirst AS firstname, response.description AS responsetime, phone.description AS telephoneservice, onsite.description AS onsiteservice, email.description AS emailservice, sc.total_hours_remaining AS hoursremaining FROM ticket t LEFT JOIN service_contract sc ON (t.link_contract_id = sc.contract_id ) LEFT JOIN lookup_sc_category cat ON (sc.category = cat.code) LEFT JOIN lookup_sc_type sc_type ON (sc.type = sc_type.code) LEFT JOIN contact ct ON (sc.contact_id = ct.contact_id) LEFT JOIN lookup_response_model response ON (sc.response_time = response.code) LEFT JOIN lookup_phone_model phone ON (sc.telephone_service_model = phone.code) LEFT JOIN lookup_onsite_model onsite ON (sc.onsite_service_model = onsite.code) LEFT JOIN lookup_email_model email ON (sc.email_service_model = email.code) WHERE ticketid = $P{ticketid} AND t.trashed_date IS NULL
